availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary Ann Holder Stearman (Ballard County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, resident. South Carolina native. Married to Nicholas Stearman in Davidson County, Tennessee, on April 20, 1824. Mother of P. Stearman, H. Stearman, Madison F. Stearman, and Mary Jane Stearman. Resident of Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 262B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, p. 623.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 5, p. 438B.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Davidson County, 1789 - 1971: Marriages, Book 1, p. 280.
